title: a298b112
author: a298b112
content: According to this news article Binance will start offering CoinMarketCap Index Series. And now I am trying to understand how it will work? Like when you buy this index Binance will buy all those top 10 crypto assets in equal amount and keep it? I mean is there a real crypto assets behind the index?

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: They've not been explicit on what they're actually doing (and that's probably because you can do it yourself if they were).https://coinmarketcap.com/indices/They're not managing the funds themselves though, a German company I haven't heard of is. I don't know how I'd expect a fund like this to do, with so much rebalancing (every quarter) would there really be a chance at strong growth when a coin's profit gets realised. I can also imagine this under performing bitcoin in bull times and catching up to it in bear periods.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: a298b112 on October 18, 2022, 11:21:10 AMAccording to this news article Binance will start offering CoinMarketCap Index Series. And now I am trying to understand how it will work? Like when you buy this index Binance will buy all those top 10 crypto assets in equal amount and keep it? I mean is there a real crypto assets behind the index? Trying to understand the Binance CMC index, I just learned that users can use it to track the values of digital assets and currencies. And the crypto assets in the index will be weighted and rebalanced every month.In other words, for individuals that are going to use the Binance CMC index, the system will select the cryptoassets in the index and distribute your funds across the index using dollar-cost averaging as well as auto-invest.If you love to read, this article was more comprehensive.: https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/0ece0aaab0b442d293e1be2eae60a19d?ref=AZTKZ9XS&utm_source=BinanceTwitter&utm_medium=GlobalSocial&utm_campaign=GlobalSocialIf you love to watch videos, this one has a simple explanation.: https://twitter.com/binance/status/1514710161482465281?t=E4T_1-kw1VUQWrRAWCFj1g&s=19
